title: Bible Watch Face
summary: Watch Face, Watch Skin, Bible Watch, Watch Theme, Easter, Christmas, New Year
description: The Bible Watch Face is created especially for Christian feasts. Each next hour it will show a new biblical motif that will warm up your heart and strengthen your spirit. The theme presents 12 episodes from life of Jesus. The Bible Watch is made of skin, blood and gold. It turns your watch into the symbol of Christianity.Watch face features:* 12 unique Bible motifs* Day of the week* Ambient / Low Ambient modes optimized* Optimized battery-lifeHow to install:It will take several minutes after installing Bible Watch Face to synchronize it  from phone to your watch. If you see no result, please use 'Resync apps' from settings of the Android Wear App.Feel free to write us if you have any issues.
descriptionHTML:
The Bible Watch Face is created especially for Christian feasts. Each next hour it will show a new biblical motif that will warm up your heart and strengthen your spirit. The theme presents 12 episodes from life of Jesus. The Bible Watch is made of skin, blood and gold. It turns your watch into the symbol of Christianity.


Watch face features:
* 12 unique Bible motifs
* Day of the week
* Ambient / Low Ambient modes optimized
* Optimized battery-life


How to install:
It will take several minutes after installing Bible Watch Face to synchronize it from phone to your watch.
If you see no result, please use 'Resync apps' from settings of the Android Wear App.
Feel free to write us if you have any issues.
comments: Hands needs more work It's graphically poor designed. Also please add the option not to show the seconds hand.Thx
I'm trying to get it working Does it work with the Samsung gear?
recentChanges: Ambient and Low Ambient modes optimized
